additionalBootstrapServers.description: An array of server URLs. Maximum number of 2 items, each of maximum length 300.

batchSize.description: The maximum number of records to include in each batch. Maximum value of 10000.

consumerGroupId.description: The name of the destination queue to consume. Maximum value of 200.

credentials.description: The credentials needed to access the resource. Detailed below.

maximumBatchingWindowInSeconds.description: The maximum length of a time to wait for events. Maximum value of 300.

serverRootCaCertificate.description: The ARN of the Secrets Manager secret used for certification.

startingPosition.description: The position in a stream from which to start reading. Valid values: TRIM_HORIZON, LATEST.

topicName.description: The name of the topic that the pipe will read from. Maximum length of 249.

vpc.description: This structure specifies the VPC subnets and security groups for the stream, and whether a public IP address is to be used. Detailed below.
